R

readLine() - Static method in class it.polimi.ingsw.view.client.cli.InputCli
This method allows you to acquire command-line input asynchronously. asynchronicity allows you to stop the thread at any time in the event that a blocking message arrives in the background (disconnection or login of a third player).
receive() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.network.XMLInputStream
This method allows to receive an XML from connection.
rejectedAnswer(String, String, List<Error>) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.msgUtilities.server.AnswerMsgWriter
This method provides to format a rejected answer.
rejectedSetWorkerOnBoardAnswer(String, String, List<Error>, String) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.msgUtilities.server.AnswerMsgWriter
This method provides to format a rejected answer associated with a request to set worker on board.
removeCurrentPlayer() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.controller.PlayerController
 
removedWorker - Variable in class it.polimi.ingsw.view.client.View
This attribute is a support attribute useful in a worker switch / push
removeFromGame() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.Worker
This method allows to set false inGame attribute (remove the worker from the game)
removeNextPlayer() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.controller.PlayerController
 
removePropertyChangeListener(PropertyChangeListener) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.Worker
 
removeWorker() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.Square
This method allows to remove the worker from current square, it is useful when a worker moves in another square.
removeWorker() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.view.client.viewComponents.Square
This method allows to free this square from the worker place on it.
removeWorker(Worker) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.view.client.viewComponents.Player
This method allows to remove a worker from this player's workers list
removeWorkerDragged(DragEvent) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.view.client.gui.GameController
This method represents the "On Drag Done" method of JavaFX for workers.

RequestParser - Class in it.polimi.ingsw.msgUtilities.server
This class is responsible for parsing the msgIn XML and call VirtualView methods to start the request processing.

resetCounters() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.Board
This method reset nMoves and nBuild to 0.
RESTORE_CURSOR_POSITION - it.polimi.ingsw.view.client.cli.graphicComponents.Escapes
 
restoreImage() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.view.client.gui.GameController
